name: phonebook-backend
description: This project is used for exercises of part 3 of fullstackopen.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && echo 'Old dist deleted' && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../phonebook-backend && echo 'New dist copied ...'
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git status && git commit -m uibuild && git push
